item.title: Lead Architect (SOMA / south beach)
item.description:
ABOUT US

Birrbit is a seed-funded start-up. We are building an online community where individuals and organizations discover and work together on shared goals. With Birrbit, nonprofits, small business and individuals have a simple yet powerful way to get things done and to save money while doing so.

We (3 founders) are seed-funded, have a working prototype, committed customers and offices in SOMA. We have previously built number of successful Internet, software, service and investment companies. Birrbit is a rare opportunity to create both significant social good and economic value.

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR?

 Highly entrepreneurial. Youll provide your opinions, ideas at every chance and help build a world-class product you can be proud of

 Confidence and a desire to be one of the first engineers of an elite team

 Well-rounded. You have your deepest expertise in solving hard-technical problems with smart software, but you comfortable rolling-up sleeves and contributing to design, user experience, and product management

 Experience architecting client-side and server-side code for consumer web applications using DTHML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, Python, and/or Java

 Experience building successful applications that involve: social networking, social media, blogging, lifestreaming, etc.

 Have some experience working with social networks API and data portability protocols (Facebook Connect, OpenSocial, Twitter, etc.)

 2-8+ years of professional software development experience

 BS, MS or PhD in Computer Science or Engineering

Compensation:

 For the right candidate, we will provide a basic salary and significant equity

If you think you're a fit, then please send an email and resume to the address listed above. Feel free to include your blog, any open source projects you work on, a list of web applications you can't live without, etc... Anything that would help us understand what your passionate about.
